main_address_raw_text: on gandhi mandapam road (next to vinayagar temple) #2 dhandayuthapani nagar, 2nd street, kotturpuram, chennai 600085
short_description: the little factory is a clothing store based in chennai, india.
long_description: the inside of the one-of-a-kind, concept store certainly lives up to the promise with its vast array of offerings for children from ages 0 to 10 years: clothes, furniture, toys, indoor and outdoor games, activity kits, decor, party kits, musical instruments, cutlery, linen and more, tlf carries it all. motivated and fully committed, preshanth and dhivya got down to the business of sourcing the different things that they wanted to offer, finding suppliers, organising their import, branding and setting up the little factory. it's like having your child's clothes custom-made." tlf works with children's designers and boutiques, such as moobaa, lil angels, lil pixie, little coogie, popsicles, mi dulce anya, samta & shruthi, janya's closet, giggles bun, little stars, first avenue, lmnop, little tribe, nee & oink, fayon, crayon flakes and tiny baby, and offers clothing for kids between 0 months and 8 years. from automatic soothing cribs to sailboat beds and elaborate bedroom sets, to wall decor, chairs, shelves and quirky, and a whole lot more, there's a fairly large selection to choose from.

generated_description: the little factory is a children's boutique store located in chennai, tamil nadu. founded by preshant and dhivya, the store offers a wide range of products for children aged 0 to 10 years, including clothing, furniture, toys, indoor and outdoor games, activity kits, decor, party kits, musical instruments, cutlery, and linen. the store features over 50 designers specializing in kids' birthday dresses, party wear, ethnic wear, and designer clothing. the little factory is known for its unique selection of toys and games, including colorful stuffed animals, skill-building toys, and high-end mini cars and bikes. the store emphasizes safety and utility in its furniture, ensuring that every piece is child-safe with rounded edges and non-toxic paint.
